name: cute-charm
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.

flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
